Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: ANKA STANZA
“O boys! listen and do not wage the war, meet me while bringing the horse, because you have inadequate strength.755.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਹਠ ਨੂੰ ਛੱਡ ਕੇ ਆ ਜਾਓ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: “Come after forsaking your persistence and do not confront me, have no fear, come and meet me.”756.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਲੱਛਮਣ ਦੀ ਗੱਲ) ਬੱਚਿਆਂ ਨੇ ਨਹੀਂ ਮੰਨੀ,
ਧਨੁਸ਼ ਫੜ ਕੇ ਉਹ ਗੱਜਦੇ ਹਨ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The boys did not agree because they were proud their strength, they caught hold of their bows and roared and did not retrace even two steps.757.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਯੁੱਧ-ਭੂਮੀ ਵਿੱਚੋਂ ਦੋ ਕਦਮ ਵੀ ਨਹੀਂ ਹਟਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੭੫੭॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: AJBA STANZA

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਦੋਵੇਾਂ ਭਰਾ ਰਣ ਵਿੱਚ ਰੁੱਧੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ,
ਤੀਰਾ ਦੀ ਝੜੀ ਲਾ ਦਿੱਤੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Both the brother were absorbed in war and showering their arrows, they tested the strength of the soldiers.758.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਸੂਰਮਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਪਰਖ ਹੋ ਰਹੀ ਹੈ ॥੭੫੮॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors fell in the battlefield being chopped into bits, and the limbs of the fighting soldiers were cut.759.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਸੂਰਮਿਆਂ ਨੇ ਰਣ-ਭੂਮੀ ਵਿੱਚ) ਤੀਰਾ ਦੀ ਝੜੀ ਲਾ ਦਿੱਤੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The pools of blood waved with the shower of arrows

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸਾਰੇ ਕ੍ਰੋਧ ਨਾਲ ਭਰੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Many enemies were killed and many were filled with fear.760.
The superb warriors began to fall in the battlefield while swinging

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸੂਰਬੀਰ (ਫੱਟੜ ਹੋ ਕੇ) ਘੁਮੇਰੀਆਂ ਖਾ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ,
ਕਈ ਯੁੱਧ ਕਰਦੇ ਰੱਜ ਗਏ ਹਨ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The wounds on the bodies were inflicted but still there was no dearth of zeal in them.761.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਯੁੱਧ ਦੇ ਚਾਉ ਨਾਲ ਮੱਚੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ ॥੭੬੧॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: APOORAB STANZA
The number of died is unaccountable, how many of them were killed and how many of them were defeated.762.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਕਿਤਨੇ ਹੀ ਹਾਰ ਕੇ (ਭੱਜ ਗਏ ਹਨ) ॥੭੬੨॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Feeling ashamed in their mind all ran away and absorbed in fear they went away, saving their lives.763.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਜਾਨ ਬਚਾ ਕੇ ਚਲੇ ਗਏ ਹਨ ॥੭੬੩॥
(ਲੜਣ ਨੂੰ ਜਿੰਨੇ ਵੀ) ਮੁੜ ਕੇ ਆਏ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Those who returned, were killed, many were wounded and many fled away.764.
The boys were victorious and the warriors were frightened, they being highly infuriated waged the war.765.
Both the brothers who were specialists in swordsmanship, in great fury were engrossed in great war.766.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਕ੍ਰੋਧ ਨਾਲ ਭਰੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ ॥੭੬੬॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: They pulled their bows and discharged the armour and seeing these warriors absorbed in a terrible war, the clusters of forces fled away.767.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਕਾਇਰ (ਡਰ ਕੇ) ਭੱਜੇ ਜਾ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੭੬੭॥
(ਕਈ) ਜੰਗ ਤੋਂ ਭੱਜੇ ਜਾ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ।
ਜੋ ਰਣ ਵਿੱਚ ਰੁੱਝੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: After getting their limbs chopped, the warriors fled away and the remaining ones fought in the war.768.
The army, being confounded, fled away, then Laksman retuned with composure.769.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਵੈਰੀ ਨੇ ਇਕ ਤੀਰ ਧਨੁਸ਼ ਵਿੱਚ ਖਿੱਚਿਆ ਹੈ
ਅਤੇ (ਲੱਛਮਣ ਦੇ) ਮੱਥੇ ਵਿੱਚ ਮਾਰਿਆ ਹੈ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Lava, stretching his bow, discharge and arrow toward the enemy, which struck Lakshman on the forehead and he fell like a tree.770.
End of the chapter entitled ‘Killing of Lakshman’ in Ramvtar in BACHITTAR NATAK.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਇਥੇ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਬਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਨਾਟਕ ਦੇ ਰਾਮਾਵਤਾਰ ਦੇ ਲੱਛਮਣ-ਬਧਹਿ ਅਧਿਆਇ ਦੀ ਸਮਾਪਤੀ।
